body_html:
@tfboyd cudnn 7.1.4 for cuda 9.2 is link to *_92.dll and for 9.0 use _90.dll. It is not typo, nvidia delete all cudnn 7.1. for cuda 9.1 download link except cudnn 7.1.2 for Linux (Power8/Power9).

@patrikhuber
Here is tensorflow-gpu1.8.0 with cuda 9.2, cudnn 7.1.4 for windows.
https://github.com/fo40225/tensorflow-windows-wheel/tree/master/1.8.0/py36/GPU/cuda92cudnn71sse2
